ALERT_COUNTRY_NOTIFICATION_TITLE: Select {{ countryName }} as the country to view this notification detail.
INTERRUPTION_LEVELS_WARNING: Indicates the importance and delivery timing of notifications for the iOS devices. Time Sensitive breaks through the focus and summary mode.
MAX_PUSHING_DURATION_TOOLTIP: If it is not sent within this period, the notif will not be sent.
NOT_FOUND_PLEASE_TYPE_FOR_SEARCH: Not Found: Enter at least {{ letterCount }} letters to search.
PLACEHOLDER_TOOLTIP_HEADER: In order for the placeholder to be in the appropriate format, please enter the placeholder box first and then add it to the title.
PLACEHOLDER_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: In order for the placeholder to be in the appropriate format, please enter the placeholder box first and then add it to the message.
START_DATE_CANT_BE_LESS_THAN_NOW: Start time cant be less than now
TITLE: Title
TYPE_TOOLTIP: When marketing notification is selected, it is checked whether the customer allows this type of notification. If permission is given, a notification is sent, otherwise a marketing notification cannot be sent. No permission checks are required for transaction notifications; This type of notification can be automatically sent to everyone.
